quest.name: A Sound Endeavor
journal:
Managingway would lend a hand─or perhaps an ear─to a sound endeavor.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested item to Savingway in the Carrotorium.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to Savingway in the Carrotorium.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Among the Ways, there is one whose task was to preserve information. His name is Savingway, and he has since awakened to the dream of recording our voices.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: To that end, he is in the midst of developing a supporter with voice-recording functionality, and has requested some components for it.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you're willing to craft these components, please seek out Keepingway yonder. He will provide you with guidance as well as the necessary materials.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Working on Savingway's request, are you? Then you've come to the right Way!

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: What he needs is a component for the circuit board. Here are the materials─if you require more, the doing supporter will assist you.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: What he needs is a component for the organic conductor. Here are the materials─if you require more, the doing supporter will assist you.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: What he needs is a component for the liquid semiconductor. Here are the materials─if you require more, the doing supporter will assist you.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Once the item is ready, hop-skip over with it to Savingway. You'll find him at work in the northwest of the Carrotorium.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects that you still have materials. Please use up your current allocation before requesting more, and remember: dreams are meaningless unless they are sustainable!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects that you still have materials. Please use up your current allocation before requesting more, and remember: dreams are meaningless unless they are sustainable!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects that you still have materials. Please use up your current allocation before requesting more, and remember: dreams are meaningless unless they are sustainable!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects that you have depleted your materials. Additional allocation approved.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects that you have depleted your materials. Additional allocation approved.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects that you have depleted your materials. Additional allocation approved.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Just that one component, and the supporter will be ready for a start-up test...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Ooh, this is precisely what I need! Thank you! I'll install it at once and commence testing!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Greetings, greetings. Hail fellow well met. This is Savingway, this is Savingway.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: ...That should do it. Now to see if it managed to record properly!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: (-Savingway's Voice-)<buzz> Greetings, greetings. Hail fellow well met. <buzz> This is Savingway, this is Savingway.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Haha, great success! While there's some distortion, the quality is already quite serviceable, and we should be able to improve upon it!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: (-Savingway's Voice-)<buzz> Greetings... Hail...well met... This...Saving... This is... <buzzzzzz>

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Oh dear, that's no good at all... The audio is getting corrupted, perhaps in the course of encoding to data...

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04696
dialogue.text: (-???-)<buzz> <squeal> <squeal> <squeal>!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! Wh-What in creation!?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: I've never heard such a horrifying sound... Is it simply data corruption, or something else? I must look into it...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: Well, though much remains to be done, we've confirmed the supporter's operation. I'll keep working on my dream─the dream that everyone will be able to listen to their favorite sounds, be it a loved one's voice or a song, no matter where they are. I hope that you'll lend me a hand again!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04696
dialogue.text: I'll keep working on my dream─the dream that everyone will be able to listen to their favorite sounds, be it a loved one's voice or a song, no matter where they are. I hope that you'll lend me a hand again!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well now, not only did you craft and deliver the component, you also attended the start-up test? Savingway would have appreciated that, I'm sure. I thank you as well.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Be it the hum of activity as we work or songs we love, many are the sounds worth preserving. Through efficient and effective management, I shall do my part to help Savingway realize his dream!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
